name: 0001 AI Chat
description: model by OpenAI that engages in human-like conversation, assists with writing tasks, answers questions, and helps with creative content generation across multiple languages.

name: Deepseek
description: A powerful AI model that rivals leading platforms like ChatGPT, offering advanced language understanding and generation capabilities at more accessible pricing, with strong performance in coding and technical domains.

name: Gemini
description: Google's flagship AI model featuring multimodal capabilities to understand text, images, audio, and code, with versions optimized for different use cases from lightweight mobile applications to complex reasoning tasks.

name: Mistral
description: An EU-based AI company producing highly efficient large language models with state-of-the-art performance, offering both open-source and commercial options with strong multilingual capabilities.

name: Kimi
description: A personalized AI assistant that adapts to individual user preferences and behaviors, offering increasingly tailored responses and support as it learns from interactions.

name: Manus
